name: Finimize.com
slogan: Finimize empowers its users to become financially savvy. In minutes
description:
? Hey there, we‚Äôre Finimize: We‚Äôre on a mission to empower you with the information and tools you need to invest with confidence. Our ever-growing community now stands at nearly 300,000.

We've launched an iOS app that aims to get users more confident putting their money to work and growing their wealth. This app has been featured twice by Apple (once as App of the Day) and was in the Product Hunt top 3 Fintech apps of the 2018. We also produce a popular daily financial newsletter that explains the key stories of the day in 3 minutes without jargon.

Finimize is written by our own experts who come from Goldman Sachs, Bloomberg and other top financial institutions; and we have talented technical, creative and entrepreneurial minds working on our products. We are also backed by Passion Capital as well as other top VCs. 

Before Finimize, CEO Max Rofagha co-founded an e-commerce startup with 200 employees and sold it in 2015 ‚Äì he was featured on the Forbes ‚Äú30 under 30" list as a result.

jobs.title: Writer
jobs.description:
As a Finimize writer, you‚Äôll directly contribute to choosing and developing the new stories we cover in the daily newsletter, the Finimize app and beyond. You‚Äôll be good at understanding financial news and concepts, and simplifying them for our readers. You‚Äôll be working directly with our VP Content and editorial team to develop new and engaging content for the Finimize community. The ideal candidate will have experience in a financial markets role.

What sets Finimize apart:
> Work directly with the founding team
> Work with a team that has a strong track record
> Join a high-growth startup with global traction and backed by some of the world‚Äôs best investors

Responsibilities:
> Work with VP Content to write Finimize‚Äôs daily financial newsletter which goes to more than 200,000 people every day ‚Äì helping them understand what the biggest stories of the day mean for them
> Share insights and guidance with the Finimize community via our app ‚Äì giving them the tools to better understand investing and to take their finances into their own hands
> Curate and write stories in the Finimize format
> Collaborate with team of writers and copy editors
> Contribute to development of the Finimize platform through new content initiatives ‚Äì our ultimate goal is to empowering our audience to become their own financial advisors

Some things we consider critical to being a Finimize writer:
> Experience analyzing, discussing and/or writing about financial markets
> A strong ability to understand and explain macroeconomic trends and concepts
> An ability to interpret and explain the performance of individual companies
> Demonstrable writing skills
> A willingness to work according to the newsflow (some late nights are necessary)
> A strong desire to work in a startup environment!

Compensation:
> Competitive equity and salary package üí∏

jobs.title: Product Analyst
jobs.description:
As a Product Analyst at Finimize, you‚Äôll play a key role in envisioning, developing and launching the products and features that empower our users to be their own financial advisors.

What sets Finimize apart:
- Work directly with a founding team that has a strong track record
- Join a fast-growing startup with global traction that‚Äôs backed by some of the world‚Äôs best investors
- Build in a design-focused culture for an engaged community of users
- Not a traditional PM role. You‚Äôll play a key role in the Product team that will guide the shaping of the product with your deep understanding of analytics, passion for the product and experience of uncovering user insights and generating new ideas.
- A culture that empowers the team to grow and take risks

Responsibilities:
- Work closely with our CEO, product designers, and engineers to implement new features and improvements to Finimize products
- Conceptualize new features and experiment to validate them with our users before moving forward to design / development
- Ensure Finimize presents a consistent experience across platforms and touchpoints
- Dig into product data: develop and continuously improve our product analytic capability, allowing data to drive product, user experience and business decisions. 
- Keep the team focused on users behavior. Track the performance of the product, from funnel conversion to usage of core features that will directly target and impact the company goals. 
- Be curious and explore: have a passion for proactively form hypotheses, leverage our rich set of data and explore in order to gain deeper understanding of our users and their behaviors.
- Keep everyone informed about Product achievements: build and maintain product and growth KPI dashboards, allow the entire team to have relevant and timely understanding of our product and customer behavior. 
- Product Experimentation: you‚Äôll be designing product experiments, using a wide array of qualitative user research and analytics, understand pain points and discover potential solutions to address user needs. 
- Data Guru: Serve as the main point of reference for the product team for all things data and analytics. 
- Performance analysis expertise: embody the expertise in defining clear and measurable objectives, choosing the right KPIs to measure and calculating targets for each new product feature.

Some things we consider critical to being a Product Analyst at Finimize:
- BS/MS in economics, mathematics, engineering, business, statistics or equivalent experience.
- 3+ years experience in shipping products at a startup, ideally a B2C mobile product
- A belief in creating the best experience for our users 
- You can comfortably communicate your product solutions with wireframes and prototypes
- A habit of taking initiative, bringing ideas to the table and experimenting to drive results
- You work best in an experiment-driven product development culture
- You strike a balance between data and intuition (product sense) 
- You want to help build a team and culture, not just a product
- You‚Äôre comfortable engaging with end-users, conducting user research, and intelligently integrating insights into your work 
- Comfortable in performing funnel, segmentation and cohort analysis with product analytic tools such as MixPanel, Google Analytics, etc. 
- Fluent in SQL and a strong experience in data visualization
- A great attitude and disposition 

Bonus Points:
- UI Design skills (Sketch / Photoshop)
- Technical skills (HTML / CSS / React / Python)
- You‚Äôre a Finimize user :D

Compensation:
- Competitive package of salary and stock options
- Sweet new laptop of choice
- Check out our culture manifest for more info on perks: www.finimize.com/culture

jobs.title: Community Manager (internship)
jobs.description:
As a Community Management Intern, you‚Äôll be directly involved in engaging with the growing Finimize Community (250,000+ subscribers globally). The Community team is responsible for ensuring every Finimizer has a memorable experience. It is our role to delight our most loyal followers, connect users online and ensure the Finimize voice is heard loud and clear. 

We‚Äôre looking for a creative individual who finds motivation in helping others and a keen interest in modern marketing strategies. It will be your responsibility to represent our users internally and act as our voice externally. You‚Äôll be directly reporting to our VP Community but will work closely with the entire team.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and support the network of users hosting their own Finimize events globally

- To act as the point person for questions form our Community and manage conversations across all channels

- Create high quality content and maintain a detailed content calendar

- Develop creative and exciting ways to engage with our 300,000 audience at scale

- Gain deep insights speaking with our Community to inform our product and content roadmap

Some things we consider critical to being our Community Management intern:


Experience in creating social content and campaigns
Excellent organizational skills
Experience in creating online content or hosting events
Outstanding relationship building skills
A ‚Äúhustler‚Äù mindset and an interest in startups

Compensation, Benefits & Timeframe
Competitive salary package üí∏
Opportunity to join our Community team full time after internship
Preferred start date: ASAP
Duration: 4-8 months

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description:
Finimize is on a mission to empower our users to become their own financial advisors.

We seek a detail-oriented product designer, an innovative problem solver, who is imaginative yet pragmatic and able to utilize a full range of visual design and user experience skills a product designer


What sets Finimize apart:

- Work closely with the founding team
- A design-focused culture for an engaged community of users
- Join a high-growth startup with global traction and backed by some of the world‚Äôs best investors
- 700k users with no paid marketing
- A culture that empowers the team to grow and take risks


What you will do:

You will work closely with a team of talented designers and engineers while engaging internal stakeholders and customers to define a long-term strategy. The ideal candidate for this role will be able to translate high-level strategy into great designs.

    * Design incredibly polished work that represents the Finimize brand 
      through visual comps, UX, wireframes and prototypes
    * Rapidly iterate on design concepts all the way through final delivery
    * Help define and evolve style guides to set the standard for an entirely new 
      suite of tools
    * Effectively communicate with and work closely with a team of engineers 
      to ensure feasibility of interface concepts and the fidelity of the final 
      output


Requirements:

    * Exceptional design skills shown through a well-crafted portfolio
    * Detail-oriented mindset, focused on creating a frictionless user experience 
    * Rapid-prototyping skills in Principle, Framer, InVision, After Effects or 
      similar
    * In-depth understanding of Figma and Sketch
    * Organized, flexible and able to act independently as a self-starter


Bonus:

    * Working knowledge of JS, HTML, CSS and Wordpress
    * An interest in startups and the Fintech sector
    * Previous work on mobile apps

- Competitive salary üí∏

jobs.title: Global Email Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
The Global Email Marketing Specialist is responsible for leading growth initiatives that support both our content and product team. You‚Äôll work across products, taking ownership of both our daily email readers as well as increasing our conversion of mobile app subscribers.


You will contribute to key lifecycle strategy decisions to ensure our customer journey is a user-first one that is driving value to the business‚Äô bottom-line.


The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience developing a user communication strategy, executing email marketing programs and driving business value. You‚Äôll enjoy both the creative and analytical sides email/push marketing and have experience of producing end-to-end campaigns.


üí∏ What sets Finimize apart?
Work directly with the founding team
Work with a team that has a strong track record
Join a high-growth startup with global traction and backed by some of the world‚Äôs best investors
400k users with no paid marketing
80% of users that refer Finimize use the word ‚ÄòLove‚Äô

üí™ Responsibilities:
Support the growth team with increasing customer activation, retention, and long term brand loyalty
Partner with our content and product teams to drive new communication tests, product decisions  and customer journeys
Know the latest tools and strategies in which to reach potential customers, engage them and increase customer retention
Produce end-to-end campaigns. Craft high-quality content, email designs and writing well-structured HTML templates.
Some things we consider critical to being our Global Email Marketing Specialist:
Passion for building products, experiences and customer journeys that engage customers and inspire them to take action
Proven track record of executing a Lifecycle marketing strategy that converts traffic, increases customer retention and drives business value
Hands-on examples of past projects involving customer engagement, communication, increasing LTV, and driving loyalty

jobs.title: Growth Marketer
jobs.description:
As our Growth Marketer, you‚Äôll be responsible for driving user acquisition as you close partnerships and execute on proven growth channels. Your work will directly impact the success of the company.

In this role, you‚Äôll be the driving force behind our user acquisition for both the daily newsletter and mobile app. Scale our already highly successful daily newsletter via sweepstakes and support our ambitious revenue targets with full autonomy of our affiliate program. 

üí∏ What sets Finimize apart?

A high-growth startup backed by some of the world‚Äôs best investors
A culture that empowers you to grow and take risks
A close-knit and diverse team with a strong track record 
A unique community spanning 650k users globally

üí™ Responsibilities:

- Identify, host and run regular sweepstake campaigns in an effort to grow our newsletter list
- Drive program strategy and develop, run and scale day-to-day operations of the Finimize affiliate program
- Manage inbound leads and research, acquire and activate partners to uplift channel growth on a global scale
- Create, maintain and update high-quality creative assets provided to sweepstake and affiliate partners 
- Run experiments, analyse and evaluate the campaign performance of partner brands to identify actionable areas of improvement, optimise performance and deliver best possible reach and ROI
- Maintain detailed campaign calendars and records of relevant campaign metrics as you track growth efforts
- Design and develop email campaigns to app users and newsletter subscribers

üëçSome things we consider critical:

- Desire to work in a fast-paced environment and a strong work ethic
Strong interpersonal and organizational skills
- Experience with design software e.g. Sketch, Figma, Photoshop
- Knowledge of HTML ‚Äì you‚Äôre happy to edit or update an existing template
- Ability to perform at a high level and problem solve quickly with little direction
- Prior demonstrable experience running growth initiatives 
- Head for numbers and an ability to extract key insights from data
- A passion for our product and mission
- The right to live and work in the UK

jobs.title: Customer Success Intern/Analyst
jobs.description:
This role is perfect for a smart, motivated, people-oriented candidate looking to gain experience in a high-growth start-up. 

You‚Äôll work directly with the VP Community to improve the customer experience for our premium subscribers.

Your primary areas of responsibility will be responding to customer queries, facilitating group chats and building out processes that ensure a great experience for all premium subscribers as we scale. 

You will be responsible for reporting data and trends on customer behaviour and providing feedback to the product and engineering teams to improve the overall customer experience in the Finimize App.

As well as customer support over email and WhatsApp you will be tasked with maximising customer to customer interactions and optimising for great outcomes for our customers.

As this will be the launch of a new function at Finimize you will need to be a confident self starter and very comfortable talking to stakeholders and customers. 

Requirements

- Some experience in customer sales, support, client relations or community management is a plus but not a necessity
- Excellent inter-personal skills. The right candidate will have a natural ability to empathise and understand people. 
- Casual but professional communication style over email and WhatsApp
- Comfortable in an ever changing start-up environment
- Hard working and willing to go the extra mile

jobs.title: Events Intern
jobs.description:
This role is perfect for a highly organised and creative candidate looking to gain experience in a high-growth start-up. You‚Äôll work directly with the Global Community Manager to expand the Finimize events around the world.

You‚Äôll work directly with the Global Community Manager to expand the Finimize offline community through managing a volunteer team of hosts around the world and organising flagship Finimize events in London.

Last year the Finimize Community held over 100 events in 30 countries with 10,000 people attending. Your primary areas of responsibility will be expanding the quantity and quality of events held under the Finimize brand. Recruiting and managing volunteers to host Finimize events in their own countries whilst assisting with ticket sales, marketing strategy and co-ordinating speakers/venues/sponsors.

You will be responsible for reporting data and trends on event attendees and providing feedback to the community hosts as well as coming up with creative campaigns to recruit new hosts and increase attendance. The role will also require you to be creative in coming up with new themes for large and small community events that inspire, inform and engage the Finimize audience.

You will be joining with the existing Finimize Community team and make an integral contribution on our journey to build the world‚Äôs largest and most engaged finance community.

Requirements

- Experience in running events from idea to execution
- Excellent inter-personal skills. The right candidate will have a natural ability to empathise and understand people. 
- Casual but professional communication style over email and WhatsApp
- Interest in building community and connecting people
- Comfortable in an ever changing start-up environment
- Hard working and willing to go the extra mile
